attributes.action: Make Nigel Farage PM with immediate effect.
attributes.background: David Cameron is a puppet to the EU and Illuminati. He has let untold numbers of potential terrorists into the country and needs to be stopped with immediate effect before its too late.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments. In any case, the Prime Minister is not chosen by the UK Government or Parliament. After a general election, the Queen decides who to invite to form a Government. In practice, this is usually the leader of the political party that wins the most seats in a general election.You can find out more about this here:

http://www.royal.gov.uk/MonarchUK/QueenandGovernment/QueenandPrimeMinister.aspx
